mediaObject.description: This segment is from the Face to Face Broadcast with Elder and Sister Rasband on September 13th, 2020. Conlon Bonner and Yaphet Bustos sing “Hark, All Ye Nations!” accompanied by CJ Madsen (piano) and Charles Ferry (cello).
mediaObject.seoDescription: This segment is from the Face to Face Broadcast with Elder and Sister Rasband on September 13th, 2020. Conlon Bonner and Yaphet Bustos sing “Hark, All Ye Nations!” accompanied by CJ Madsen (piano) and Charles Ferry (cello).
mediaObject.shareableDescription: This segment is from the Face to Face Broadcast with Elder and Sister Rasband on September 13th, 2020. Conlon Bonner and Yaphet Bustos sing “Hark, All Ye Nations!” accompanied by CJ Madsen (piano) and Charles Ferry (cello).

thumbnail.description: Conlon Bonner and Yaphet Bustos, a Latter-day Saint duet, sings, “Hark, All Ye Nations!” during the Face to Face for Young Adults broadcast with Elder Ronald A. Rasband, of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles, and his wife, Melanie, on Sunday, September 13, 2020, on the set of ancient Jerusalem in Goshen, Utah.
thumbnail.publicAltText: A man in a suit sings into a microphone at a concert with a cello being played slightly visible in the background.
thumbnail.seoDescription: Conlon Bonner and Yaphet Bustos, a Latter-day Saint duet, sings, "Hark, All Ye Nations!” during the Face to Face for Young Adults broadcast with Elder Ronald A. Rasband, of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles, and his wife, Melanie, on Sunday, September 13, 2020, on the set of ancient Jerusalem in Goshen, Utah.
